data.name: Up to 45% Off Beauty & Perfume at Nordstrom
data.description: Nordstrom is having a huge Beauty & Perfume Sale right now. Prices start from only $2.55. Free shipping is included with your order.

data.name: (Set of 2) 'Yay!' Shot Glasses by Slant Collections
data.description: Check out this awesome Yay!' Shot Glasses by SLANT COLLECTIONS from Nordstrom. You can get a set for only $3.85 (reg. $11.00) with free shipping! Order soon, sale items go fast!

data.name: Earn Macy's Money + Extra 15% Off Home Sale + Specials
data.description: Take an Extra 10-15% Off (no minimum) with code: MONEY at checkout. Free shipping on orders over $99 or with any beauty item purchase!

data.name: Starbucks | 25% Off Coffee & Tea
data.description: Starbucks is offering 25% Off Coffee & Tea. Prices as marked. Get Free shipping on $50+.

data.name: Car Magnetic Air Vent Mount Holder Stand
data.description: Get this Car Magnetic Air Vent Mount Holder Stand at eBay for only $1.18. Plus, shipping is free on this item!

data.name: Men's Croft & Barrow Classic-Fit Plaid Flannel Button-Down Shirt (Member Only)
data.description: Kohl's is offering a Men's Croft & Barrow Classic-Fit Plaid Flannel Button-Down Shirt for only $5.04 when you use coupon Code LUCKY30 and FS4MARCH with Kohl's Charge members! Also, everyone can get 15% off with code SAVE15 and get additional $10 off select men's clothing and shoes purchases with code MENSTYLE10 at checkout. Get free shipping on orders over $75+.
